Title: EM - Add Polling Place: EM - Polling Place - Add Polling Place - Save Voting Details and Contacts

Test Steps.Step Action: Login to application with valid credentials\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should successfully login to application\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Polling Places under Election Management Tab\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should land into Election Polling Place Management page\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Search Polling Place" button\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should navigate to "Polling Place Search" page\n
User should navigate to "Polling Place Screen" page\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Scroll down to look for Voter details
Test Steps.Step Expected: Voter details with Voting districts Districts/Precincts  to be displayed.
Contact details fields to be displayed.
Contact details fields to be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on Add another contact another time \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Contact details fields to be displayed and Add another contact button to be disappeared

Title: VM - Voter - Voter Search - Previous Name or Address

Test Steps.Step Action: Login to application with valid credentials\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should successfully login to application\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Voter under Voter Management Tab\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should land on to Voter Management page
User should land on the Voter search page

Test Steps.Step Action: User selects the Previous Name radio button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Date of Birth field is removed from the screen

Test Steps.Step Action: User can search with the first, last name fields to fetch the previous records of that voter
Test Steps.Step Expected: Previous name search should find records in the previous name table. The search will be narrowed down based on the Name History\n

Test Steps.Step Action: User can search previous records using the address fields
Test Steps.Step Expected: Previous address search should find records in the previous address table The search will be narrowed down based on the Previous Address History\n
